Welcome to the example \textbf{cosmodown} thesis and dissertation. This document outlines how to write and edit your thesis using markdown syntax via the \textbf{cosmodown} and \textbf{bookdown} packages. The origianl \LaTeX\ template was developed by Paul Johnson, and altered for compatibility with R Markdown by Jake Thompson. For additional help, please see the  \href{https://github.com/wjakethompson/cosmodown}{Github repository}.
